channel.title: SHARE Data :: SHARE-CZ Project in the Czech Republic
channel.description: Overview of SHARE Data The current public data release is SHARE Release 9.0.0 All datasets with DOI registration are available at: ðŸ”— https://share-eric.eu/data/data-documentation Overview of Survey Waves SHARE is a panel study conducted every two years since 2004. The Czech Republic has participated since the second wave in 2006. Overview of Respondent Sample Below is a visualization of respondent numbers by wave.
